Class SelectStarterCardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObserver
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.gui.guiControllers.SelectStarterCardController
public class SelectStarterCardController extends ModelObserver
The controller for the Select Starter Card view Uses ModelObserver to be updated with the ViewModelState
